title: when is going google to add double-tap to sleep for the pixel?
content:
I had a Sony Xperia and like LG and other cell phones it had the double-tap sleep/awake gesture, and reading some posts on the internet I was able to find several launchers that has this gesture, I was wondering if the gesture is going to be added to the google launcher, and if so.... it's going to be any time soon?

Thanks,
Regards
